issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by NM_007960.3 (Etv1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Reference base in question determined to be a non-consensus splice site.

issue.summary: Uncertified short overlap between AC155233.2 and CT030137.13 causing contig building problems
issue.description: Uncertified short overlap between adjacent TPF components AC155233.2 and CT030137.13 causing contig building problems
issue.resolution_text: A certificate has been submitted for this 4 bp short join.

issue.summary: Issues in region from CT030146 to AC124601 are affecting contig building.
issue.description: Issues in TPF region from CT030146 to AC124601 are affecting contig building.
issue.resolution_text: AC214053 and AC200339 were removed from the TPF after analyzing overlaps between the clones covering the area. A type 2 gap has been inserted between CT030146 and AC124601.

issue.summary: WGS to span type-3 gap between CT010462.5 and AC168853.1
issue.status_text: CH25-642L15 has been selected for sequencing.
issue.description: WGS can be added to chr.12 TPF to span type-3 gap between CT010462.5 and AC168853.1
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: Traces for the clone sequence will be reviewed.
issue.description: Alignment of RefSeq Ahnak2 ( XM_001475946.1) to reference component AC124353.5 suggests that there could be a problem with the assembly of an unresolved tandem repeat
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Reference Assembly gap between accessions CT030146.7 and AC124601.5
issue.description: There is a Reference Assembly gap between accessions CT030146.7 and AC124601.5
issue.resolution_text: AC238676.3 has been sequenced and submitted, and it spans the gap between CT030146.7 and AC124601.5

issue.description: Possible duplicated sequence (or redundant clone placement) on either side of an assembly gap.
issue.resolution_text: Problematic clone AC162933.2 has been removed from the TPF and replaced with newly sequenced clone AC205767.5, which is supported by optical map data.

issue.description: Reference assembly gap between accessions CT025683.13 and CT571254.7.
issue.resolution_text: CU468259.2 fills the gap from CT025683.13 to CT571254.7

issue.summary: Ch.12 Reference Assembly Gap - Type 2 - AC165157.4/AC163633.4
issue.description: Reference assembly gap between accessions AC165157.4 and AC163633.4
issue.resolution_text: AC242683.3 (WI1-2006E21) has been sequenced and submitted, and it spans the gap between Build 37 components AC165157.4 and AC163633.4.

issue.summary: Ch.12 Reference Assembly Gap - Type 2 - AC126554.3/AC211878.4
issue.status_text: RP23-300N15 has been requested for sequencing.
issue.description: Reference assembly gap between accessions AC126554.3 and AC211878.4
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Ch.12 Reference Assembly Gap - Type 2 - AC160990.4/AC105950.12
issue.description: Reference assembly gap between accessions AC160990.4 and AC105950.12.
issue.resolution_text: AC243430.3 has been sequenced and spans this gap.

issue.description: Reference assembly gap between CU041254.6 and AC158232.2
issue.resolution_text: AC241534.2 has been sequenced and submitted and spans this gap from CU041254.6 to AC158232.2

issue.summary: Possible single nucleotide error in reference component AC163688.5
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC163688.5
issue.resolution_text: This base has been corrected and the clone resubmitted as AC163688.8. The switchpoints have also been changed to use the sequence of the overlapping clone AC167979.3 through the region of overlap.

issue.summary: Rearrangement of a repetitive "Missing from WGA" region in Chr. 12
issue.description: The repetitive region from AC153727.6 to AC132472.3 does not match the fingerprint map and could be ordered incorrectly.
issue.resolution_text: This region has been rearranged, and the new order is supported by fingerprint maps, better contiguity, and high quality joins

issue.summary: Possible single nucleotide error in reference component AC163034.4
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone
issue.resolution_text: This base has been corrected and the clone resubmitted with accession AC163034.5

issue.description: NM_026939.1 GeneID: 69099 (1810009N02Rik) may be missing from the reference
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap present between Build 37 components AC153727.6 and AC156036.4
issue.resolution_text: AC243979.3 has been sequenced and submitted and spans this gap.

issue.description: There is an assembly gap between Build 37 components AC153662.6 and AC123808.3
issue.resolution_text: This gap no longer exists due to rearrangements of this region that are being tracked in MG-3877

issue.description: There is an assembly gap between Build 37 components AC123808.3 and AC122327.5
issue.resolution_text: This gap no longer exists due to rearrangements of this region that are being tracked in MG-3877

issue.description: There is an assembly gap between Build 37 components AC124530.4 and AC163041.3
issue.resolution_text: This gap no longer exists due to rearrangements of this region that are being tracked in MG-3877

issue.description: There is an assembly gap between Build 37 components AC163041.3 and AC132472.3
issue.resolution_text: This gap no longer exists due to rearrangements of this region that are being tracked in MG-3877

issue.description: There is an assembly gap between Build 37 components AC114412.9 and CT868733.7
issue.resolution_text: This gap is closed by accession CU024890.15

issue.description: Chromosome 12 does not extend into telomeric repeat.
issue.resolution_text: AC225445.3 has been sequenced and submitted and extends into telomeric repeat.

issue.description: AC140184.2 is phase 2 draft sequence in the Build 37 chromosome 12 reference.
issue.resolution_text: This clone has been finished and submitted as complete sequence with accession AC140184.4

issue.description: AC159637.3 is phase 2 draft sequence in the Build 37 chromosome 12 reference.
issue.resolution_text: This clone has been finished and submitted as complete sequence with accession AC159637.4

issue.description: CT010455.18 is phase 2 draft sequence in the Build 37 chromosome 12 reference.
issue.resolution_text: This clone has been finished and submitted as complete sequence with accession CT010455.19

issue.status_text: PCR_C57BL6J_AC090887_1 has been created to address this issue.
issue.description: There is an IS10 element and one copy of the flanking target site duplication (CACTTTGCC) in GTC clone AC090887.3
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Alt loci clone AJ851868.3 contains contamination
issue.description: AJ851868.3, a component of the MGSCv37 SvImJ_Mmchr12 alt locus, contains contamination.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap between components AC167360.3 and AC240395.3. This ticket tracks the continued effort to close the gap reported in MG-60.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Alignment of GeneID:17263 (Meg3) to reference component AC107681.15 indicates a possible 555bp deletion in this component.
issue.resolution_text: Deleted, redundant component AC107681.1 has been removed from the reference. Component AC152063.5 contains the deleted sequence and provides good representation for GeneID:17263 (Meg3).

issue.description: Alignment of GeneID:17263 (Meg3) to reference component AC107681.15 indicates a possible 555bp deletion in this component.
issue.resolution_text: This ticket is a duplicate of linked ticket MG-4180. All work on this issue will be tracked in MG-4180.

issue.description: Part of Immp2l (GeneID: 93757) lies within the assembly gap between CAAA01224406.1 and CAAA01003706.1
issue.resolution_text: AC240395.3 has been sequenced and extends into this gap for GRCm38. Further gap closure efforts will be tracked in MG-4167.
